title: Call To Actions Widget
description: A widget that displays one or more call-to-action buttons with customizable appearance and behavior

isSticky.description: Whether the buttons should stick to the bottom of the screen

isStickyFooter.description: Whether the buttons should be in a sticky footer with white background and border

isArrowAnimatedButton.description: Whether to use an animated button with an arrow

stickyFooterVariant.description: Visual variant for the sticky footer

items.description: List of call-to-action buttons to display

variant.description: Visual variant of the button. PRIMARY: Brand color with white text. SECONDARY: White with brand color text. TERTIARY: Transparent with brand color text.

size.description: Size of the button. SMALL: 32px height. MEDIUM: 40px height. LARGE: 48px height.

fullWidth.description: Whether the button should take full width of the container

customType.description: Custom button shape. ROUNDED: Full rounded corners. SQUARED: Minimal rounded corners.

loading.description: Whether to show a loading spinner instead of text

slugUrl.description: URL slug for the button when using CtaWithAnimation

actions.description: List of actions to perform when clicked
